company.name: Building an orphanage in the slums of Cairo, Egypt.

volunteer_experiences.description: Building an orphanage in the slums of Helwan, Cairo, Egypt. Great experience as it united people of different religions in the eternal need to care for widows and orphans. Making concrete with a shovel on the ground with 48 degrees Celsius without a concrete-mixer was my biggest challenge. After this you never complain about heat any more because everything after will be better than this heat.

company.name: Youth camp in Fojnica, Bosnia Herzegovina

volunteer_experiences.description: Organized a youth camp in Bosnia Herzegovina, Fojnica with Dutch and Bosnian youth. Just after the Bosnian war together with the community of Rheden, I helped to setup up a youth camp. The aim was to connect young people of both Bosnia and the Netherlands to discuss and learn from the war experiences. One year later I helped organizing this again but then we got the Bosnian youth to the Netherlands. These two events helped the Bosnians to get just a bit further over their war traumas and out of their isolation and was for the Dutch an important lesson in understanding and helping a complete different culture and going the extra mile for people who are heavily impacted by the war.
